extendedInfo.description: Take advantage of all the benefits of Coupons.com - right from your phone or tablet!Saving money on your favorite brands has never been easier. Just select the coupons you want and save in the store. Choose from over a hundred manufacturer coupons to save on groceries, household goods, personal care items and more.With the Coupons.com app, you can access printable coupons, Savings Card coupons, and local coupons. Printable coupons can be redeemed at the store just like the ones you find in the Sunday newspaper. Add coupons to your grocery store Savings Card and have your savings automatically applied at checkout. Features:â¢ Get all the same coupons you see on Coupons.comâ¢ Email coupons to print from a computerâ¢ Add coupons directly to your grocery store Savings Cardâ¢ Save on the brands you love most!

reviews.title: Update sucks
reviews.comment: I was enjoying this game so much, then they updated and it freezes every time I go into the build menu. After it crashes it says sorry, not enough memory, pease restart, but it keeps doing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bluetooth or wifi?
reviews.comment: Would be great if there was an option to send coupons directly to my printer via Bluetooth or wifi from myphone to print! Would be super convenient for us with wireless printers.  And my Randalls doubles/triples coupons,  if loaded to my card will they still do that? Thanks anyone for answer in advance!
reviews.author: Dani O

reviews.title: CANNOT PRINT????!
reviews.comment: Why on earth would I want a coupon app for my phone or tablet if I have to e-mail it to a computer to print?  What about those of us who have moved into the 21st century and don\'t own a computer!  Ridiculous waste of time to download this app.  Completely disappointing!  I would rate it \"0\" stars if that were an option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It is better than the website. You do not have to click through pages of coupons. I easily printed out the coupons via the link sent to my email. Keep it up.
reviews.author: Sun Flower

reviews.title: Utterly Pointless !
reviews.comment: Utterly pointless.  Being away from home,having access to another printer is a tad difficult (added, hotels don\'t want you installing exe files).  So - what is the point of this app ??  You send an email of the coupons you want, only to open that email and it takes you back to the website - and again asking you to print / install the exe file.    Don\'t bother if you don\'t have admin access to another printer - utterly pointless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: Unable to print coupons, always send you to download coupon printer which never downloads.
reviews.author: Angelique Williams

reviews.title: Cant print fron Android
reviews.comment: Why only make it so you can print from an apple product. I dont buy that expensive crap. Make it available to print from all mobile devices.
reviews.author: Danielle Villafuerte

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Its a great app if it would email the coupons to my email it always stops on android. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Wish you could use the coupons right from the phone and save the like of printing them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More stores
reviews.comment: Great app wish it had more local stores to add a savings card. Orb even national like walgreens, rite aid, cvs. Also would like ONLY coupons I CLIP to be emailed to me. It\'s no phone sifting thru all the coupons again in your email.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most pointless app ever
reviews.comment: The app allows me to see what coupons are available and gives me the option to email the coupon to myself. However, when I open the email, there is no coupon, just a link that takes me to a page with links to download the app again. this app is not worth the time it takes to download it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No benefit over website
reviews.comment: What\'s the point? Maybe if someone doesn\'t have a computer... Not worth it to me b/c u still have to print the coupons. I\'m looking for an app where the coupons are searchable & scannable all right from my phone. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Dee Dee Egner

reviews.title: Why is this app in the playstore?
reviews.comment: This app is useless if you can\'t print the coupons from your tablet or phone even if you have a wireless printer.  Trying to access your coupons is a never ending loop of first emailing the coupons to you, when you click the link, it takes you back to the website which tells you \'no browser support.  Download the app\'.  You can only use the coupon printer with a desktop/laptop.  Useless.
reviews.author: Javacia Huff

reviews.title: Not android(linux) friendly.
reviews.comment: This is not supported on linux\\android systems. Waste of time. I\'ve spent countless hours on ubuntu 12.10 with wine and a few hours on my Samsung tablet with 4.0 ics. Does not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Let us print on Android
reviews.comment: Be advised... you have to email yourself the coupon. It would be nice if we could view the coupon bar code to use at the check out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Whenever I send coupons to my email it just sends me a link to download the app again. No coupons. It is a waste of time.
reviews.author: Veronica Diaz

reviews.title: not mobile user friendly
reviews.comment: this app is accessed through my cell phone, emailed to myself via my cell phone, yet I can\'t see and/or print the coupons via my cell phone?? yeah, that makes sense. having to log into a computer and/or download a \"special\" reader on a PC is a waste and is cumbersome. I could kill a tree weekly and clip coupons out of the Sunday paper for all this work. <UNINSTALLED>
reviews.author: Lola Brown

reviews.title: Good app that has potential
reviews.comment: GOOD - Easy to use - Good deals  SUGGESTIONS - Print Coupons directly from phone or redeem through phone - make it so you can save your coupon cart and send it to more than one email for redemption - sort by date - save spot scrolling in list if you open coupon details
reviews.author: Anthony C

reviews.title: Very useless for Android
reviews.comment: If change is made to print from actual phone for Android and not email to only open and be re directed to the same page it dont allow u to print from ....Apple products only for this app....ANDROID USER!
reviews.author: Faith Ellison

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: Keeps  redirecting me back to download the app again can\'t download coupon why bother
reviews.author: david morgan
